H0.text: It bends when light passes from air to water.

H1.text: It contracts when light passes from air to water.

H2.text: It brightens is what happens to light when it passes from air to water.

H3.text: It speeds up when light passes from air to water.

A4.text: Refraction occurs when light goes through a water surface since water has a refractive index of 1.33 and air has a refractive index of about 1.

A5.text: Light slows as it travels through a medium other than vacuum (such as air, glass or water).
